metadata.title: CVE-2022-2509 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
A vulnerability found in gnutls. This security flaw happens because of a double free error occurs during verification of pkcs7 signatures in gnutls_pkcs7_verify function.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-2509` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gnutls-bin - 3.7.7-2ubuntu1
guile-gnutls - 3.7.7-2ubuntu1
libgnutls-dane0 - 3.7.7-2ubuntu1
libgnutls-openssl27 - 3.7.7-2ubuntu1
libgnutls30 - 3.7.7-2ubuntu1
libgnutlsxx30 - 3.7.7-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> per upstream, affects 3.6.0 to 3.7.6, but code in bionic looks similar

criterions.comment: gnutls28 package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.7.7-2ubuntu1').
